examples.korean: He was stupefied by the amount they had spent. 발음듣기 그는 그들이 소비한 액수에 깜짝 놀랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was stupefied by the amount they had spent. 발음

examples.korean: Consumers are often jerked around by big companies. 발음듣기 큰 회사들은 종종 소비자를 애먹인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Consumers are often jerked around by big companies. 발음

examples.korean: Inflation is nibbling away at spending power. 발음듣기 인플레이션 때문에 소비력이 조금씩 떨어지고 있다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Inflation is nibbling away at spending power. 발음

examples.korean: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption. 발음듣기 그 고기는 인간이 소비하기에[먹기에] 부적합한 것으로 발표되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption. 발음

examples.korean: the production of fuel for domestic consumption 발음듣기 가정 소비용 연료 생산 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the production of fuel for domestic consumption 발음
